mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_address( uid , recv_name, recv_province, recv_city, recv_area, recv_district, recv_address, recv_phone, recv_tel, recv_zip, recv_tag, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvProvince}, #{recvCity}, #{recvArea}, #{recvDistrict}, #{recvAddress}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvTel}, #{recvZip}, #{recvTag}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser},#{modifiedTime})
